mapper.select: select tP.nProjectSeq as seq, tP.sTitle as title, tP.sDescription as description, tP.dtStart as start, tP.dtEnd as end, tP.bIsProceeding as isProceeding, tP.nHeadcount as headcount, tP.sMainFunction as mainFunction, tP.sInterest as interest, tP.sGithub as github, tP.bIsPublic as isPublic, tUP.sMyPart as myPart from tProject tP JOIN tUserProject tUP ON tP.nProjectSeq = tUP.nProjectSeq where tUP.nUserSeq = #{userSeq} and tP.bIsPublic = 1
mapper.insert:
insert into tProject(sTitle, sDescription, dtStart, dtEnd, bIsProceeding, nHeadcount, sMainFunction, sInterest, sGithub, bIsPublic) values (#{title}, #{description}, #{start}, #{end}, #{isProceeding}, #{headcount}, #{mainFunction}, #{interest}, #{github}, #{isPublic})
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: select nProjectSeq as seq, sTitle as title, sDescription as description, dtStart as start, dtEnd as end, nHeadcount as headcount, sMainfunction as mainFunction, sInterest as interest, sGithub as github, bIsPublic as isPublic, bIsProceeding as isProceeding, dtCreatedAt as createdAt from tProject where nProjectSeq = #{projectSeq}
mapper.update: update tProject set sTitle=#{updateParam.title}, bIsPublic=#{updateParam.isPublic}, sDescription=#{updateParam.description}, dtStart=#{updateParam.start}, dtEnd=#{updateParam.end}, bIsProceeding=#{updateParam.isProceeding}, nHeadcount=#{updateParam.headcount}, sMainFunction=#{updateParam.mainFunction}, sInterest=#{updateParam.interest}, sGithub=#{updateParam.github}, dtModifiedAt= now() where nProjectSeq = #{projectSeq}
